EmailTemplate.name: 202101_Global_HAT_Sell-More_Don't-Miss-Out-On-These-Rock-Bottom-Prices.Don't-Mis
EmailTemplate.subject: Other Aero buyers are taking advantage of these new markdowns, are you?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Honeywell Aerospace Trading (HAT) is offering discounts up to 30% off previous prices by listing our rock bottom pricing, and then offering an additional 10% off. Visit GoDirect Trade <[[http://www.godirecttrade.com/]]> today, find the part you want and checkout within 60 seconds or less. Use promo code TENOFF and get a minimum of 10% off your total cart at checkout for this limited time offering of over 1000 parts. SHOP NOW <[[https://www.godirecttrade.com/promotion.html]]> Stay healthy, stay safe, and take care,
Timi Reed-Jeske Sales Leader Honeywell Aerospace Trading
